name: @hashd/bytecave-relay
description: ByteCave P2P Relay and Bootstrap Node

scripts.relay:local: docker stop bytecave-relay 2>/dev/null || true && docker rm bytecave-relay 2>/dev/null || true && docker build -t bytecave-relay:latest . && docker run -d --name bytecave-relay -p 4001:4001 -p 4002:4002 -p 4003:4003 -p 9090:9090 -v bytecave-relay-data:/data -e RELAY_PRIVATE_KEY_PATH=/data/relay-key.json bytecave-relay:latest && echo 'Relay started. Health: http://localhost:9090/health'
